TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IOutputChannel implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject
type IOutputChannel = interface interface IChannel interface ICommunicationObject

summary.span: 定义通道为发送消息而必须实现的接口。

span.span: Defines the interface that a channel must implement to send a message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-interface-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-interface-note.md)] 接口定义 操作的同步变量和异步变量。The interface defines synchronous and asynchronous variants of the operation. 该接口为通道上发送出去的消息的目标提供 。It provides a for the destination of the messages sent out on the channel.

summary.span: 开始一个发送消息的异步操作。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to send a message.

summary.span: 开始一个异步操作，向输出通道的目标传输一条消息。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to transmit a message to the destination of the output channel.
The that references the asynchronous message transmission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输出通道上发出的消息的目标是在通道创建时指定的。The destination for messages sent out on an output channel is specified at channel creation time. 方法不对到远程终结点的消息传递进行保证。The method does not guarantee the delivery of message to the remote endpoint. 如果需要传递保证，则使用 。If delivery guarantees are required, use the . 如果发送的消息大于使用的绑定所允许的最大消息大小，则将引发 。If the message sent is larger that the maximum message size allowed by the binding being used, a is thrown. 最大消息大小由 属性设置。The maximum message size is set by the property. 默认值为 65536 字节。The default value is 65536 bytes. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此方法：The following code illustrates how to implement this method: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingchannellistener.cs#2)]

summary.span: 开始一个异步操作，在指定时间间隔内向输出通道的目标传输消息。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to transmit a message to the destination of the output channel within a specified interval of time.
The that references the asynchronous send operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输出通道上发出的消息的目标是在通道创建时指定的。The destination for messages sent out on an output channel is specified at channel creation time. 方法不对到远程终结点的消息传递进行保证。The method does not guarantee the delivery of message to the remote endpoint. 如果需要传递保证，则使用 。If delivery guarantees are required, use . 如果发送的消息大于使用的绑定所允许的最大消息大小，则将引发 。If the message sent is larger that the maximum message size allowed by the binding being used, a is thrown. 最大消息大小由 属性设置。The maximum message size is set by the property. 默认值为 65536 字节。The default value is 65536 bytes. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此方法：The following code illustrates how to implement this method: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingchannellistener.cs#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果发送的消息大于使用的绑定所允许的最大消息大小，则将引发 。If the message sent is larger that the maximum message size allowed by the binding being used, a is thrown. 最大消息大小由 属性设置。The maximum message size is set by the property. 默认值为 65536 字节。The default value is 65536 bytes. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此方法：The following code illustrates how to implement this method: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingchannellistener.cs#4)]

summary.span: 获取在输出通道上发出的消息将要到达的服务的目标。

span.span: Gets the destination of the service to which messages are sent out on the output channel.

value.span: 输出通道发送的消息将要到达的服务的 。

span.span: The of the service to which the output channel sends messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定 ， 将用作最终目标和物理地址。The serves as both the ultimate destination and the physical address if a is not specified. 如果已指定 ，则此地址为消息将要发送至的实际物理地址，且消息必须通过此地址到达目标。If the is specified, then that is the actual physical address to which the message is sent and through which the message must go to arrive at its destination. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此属性：The following code illustrates how to implement this property: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingchannellistener.cs#0)]

summary.span: 在当前输出通道上发送一条消息。

span.span: Sends a message on the current output channel.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Send (System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message message);

abstract member Send : System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message -> unit

param.name: message
param.span: 将在输出通道上发送的 。

span.span: The being sent on the output channel.

summary.span: 向输出通道的目标传输一条消息。

span.span: Transmits a message to the destination of the output channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输出通道上发出的消息的目标是在通道创建时指定的。The destination for messages sent out on an output channel is specified at channel creation time. 方法不对到远程终结点的消息传递进行保证。The method does not guarantee the delivery of message to the remote endpoint. 出于各种原因， 的实现可能在不提示的情况下丢弃消息。An implementation of can silently drop messages for a variety of reasons. 例如，没有更多的缓冲区空间。There may be no more buffer room, for example. 如果需要传递保证，则使用 。If delivery guarantees are required, use . 将消息传递到输出通道中会导致消息被使用。Passing the message into the output channel causes the message to be consumed. 在调用 后，就再也不能检查消息或对消息调用 。After you call , you can no longer inspect the message or call on the message. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此方法：The following code illustrates how to implement this method: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingchannellistener.cs#5)]

summary.span: 在指定时间间隔内在当前输出通道上发送一条消息。

span.span: Sends a message on the current output channel within a specified interval of time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输出通道上发出的消息的目标是在通道创建时指定的。The destination for messages sent out on an output channel is specified at channel creation time. 方法不对到远程终结点的消息传递进行保证。The method does not guarantee the delivery of message to the remote endpoint. 出于各种原因， 的实现可能在不提示的情况下丢弃消息。An implementation of can silently drop messages for a variety of reasons. 例如，没有更多的缓冲区空间。There may be no more buffer room, for example. 如果需要传递保证，则使用 。If delivery guarantees are required, use . 将消息传递到输出通道中会导致消息被使用。Passing the message into the output channel causes the message to be consumed. 在调用 后，就再也不能检查消息或对消息调用 。After you call , you can no longer inspect the message or call on the message. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此方法：The following code illustrates how to implement this method: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingchannellistener.cs#6)]

span.span: The that contains the transport address to which messages are sent on the output channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定 ， 将用作最终目标和物理地址。The serves as both the ultimate destination and the physical address if a is not specified. 如果已指定 ，则此地址为消息将要发送至的实际物理地址，且消息必须通过此地址到达目标。If the is specified, then that is the actual physical address to which the message is sent and through which the message must go to arrive at its destination. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此属性：The following code illustrates how to implement this property: [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageInterceptor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageinterceptor/cs/interceptingchannellistener.cs#1)]
